channel.title: AnimeVersus
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "AnimeVersus" - extra item huh?

item.title: Re: AnimeVersus
item.content:encoded: It takes months if you don't have very many rivals (you will get the ability to add rivals at 10th or 20th level, I forget which). It goes much faster if you have a decent number of rivals. There is a thread on Random's boards for people looking for AV Rivals.

item.title: Re: AnimeVersus
item.content:encoded:
Thx for the info guys.

One last question. Will it take long? XD

item.title: Re: AnimeVersus
item.content:encoded: If you want all three to have the item, then yes, you would need to Transmute three AV characters. You only get one code per AV character, to work with one BvS character.

item.title: Re: AnimeVersus
item.content:encoded: Thank you Ren Po Ken. Wow… does that mean if I want my 3 alts to get the bike I need to make 3 AnimeVersus accounts and loop all three of them?

item.title: Re: AnimeVersus
item.content:encoded: You get the Pika-Bike when you Transmute (loop) once in AV. There will be a box near the bottom of your main character screen where you enter the name of the BvS character you want to get the bike. The page will then spit out a code that you enter in that character's +30 Daily Stamina box and the Pika-Bike will magically appear.

item.title: Re: AnimeVersus
item.content:encoded: I thought it was a gag when I stumbled upon it, but check the Pika-Bike on the permanent item list.

item.title: AnimeVersus
item.content:encoded:
Guy in the party house chat mentioned that if we played the first game McM had on the site then we get some item…

I have no idea about anything before BvS so I was hoping someone could fill me in on things. :)
